post.body: wait... I'm not supposed to be using a BBQ in my living room? I'm sleepy...
No clue? Why?
w00t. BTW, when you want to send something to me on here, use @(then my screenname) or d (then my screen name) for a direct
are they just getting pounded up there N. of the border?
cool Seattle-specific article up on Gizmodo: http://is.gd/caUO. Might be good piece for the Big Blog.
tell them everyone else is doing it. Then hit them.
please tell me you have it insured... I got renters to try and cover my stuff, I'm pushing @jonmcq to do the same for his DVDs
yeah, but it's totally worth it!
New augemented reality ad from Mini http://is.gd/c9pz Check the NSFW Japanese augmented reality link too. girls dressed like cats, FTW? Y/N?

Storms in Washington have the best PR ever... I wish I could deliver a client that much coverage for something they MIGHT do...

Friend who works in local news was putting together a storm package, I suggested DEATHSTORM for the big graphic with a cloud and crossbones.
So, apparently it's just not snowing on Queen Anne?
Ummm... where's the snow? I'm beginning to think being a weatherman is like being a witchdoctor.
So, where's this snow they said we were getting?

Been thinking about this and I'll go ahead and say it... Burn After Reading sucked.
Just saw an ad for a Trojan brand finger vibrator. Watching tv with mom and sis. AWKWARD! Also, old lady in ad killed the moment for me
I'm calling it now, major talking point for next Seattle mayoral election: snow removal.
